data.name: Lo-fi
data.description: Relaxing and chill music with a vintage feel, often used as background music for studying or working.

data.name: Sad
data.description: Music that evokes feelings of melancholy or sorrow, often characterized by slow tempos and somber melodies.

data.name: Happy
data.description: Upbeat and joyful music that promotes a positive and energetic mood, often featuring lively rhythms and melodies.

data.name: Romantic
data.description: Music that expresses love and affection, often characterized by soft melodies and emotional lyrics.

data.name: Energetic
data.description: High-tempo music that stimulates activity and excitement, typically featuring fast beats and powerful rhythms.

data.name: Chill
data.description: Relaxed and soothing music that helps to create a calm and serene atmosphere, often with mellow beats and smooth sounds.

data.name: Epic
data.description: Grand and dramatic music that builds intensity and creates a sense of awe, often used in film scores and trailers.

data.name: Dance
data.description: Music designed to get people moving, characterized by rhythmic beats and catchy melodies, often used in clubs and parties.

data.name: Meditative
data.description: Music intended to aid in relaxation and meditation, often featuring gentle, repetitive sounds and minimalistic arrangements.

data.name: Ambient
data.description: Music that focuses on creating atmospheric soundscapes, often with minimal rhythmic elements and a focus on texture and tone.
